recommended_degree: Teknik Mesin, Teknik Perancangan dan Konstruksi Mesin, Teknik Perancangan Mekanik dan Mesin (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Join us as a Mechanical Design Intern and support the engineering team in creating and improving mechanical drawings. In this role, you will:

1. Creating simple 2D and 3D drawings using CAD software (SolidWorks).
2. Updating and revising existing drawings.
3. Assisting with drafting work such as dimensioning and detailing.
4, Supporting engineers by preparing basic technical documents.

This position is ideal for graduates who want hands-on experience in mechanical design, drafting, and engineering documentation.
